title: ŠAMPON ZA MASTNE LASE BEAUTY KISS, 300ML

product-info.opis: BEAUTY KISS šampon zanesljivo čisti lase ostankov maščobe. Lahka formula s pantenolom (provitaminom B5) daje občutek svežine in daje lasem vitalnost in lahkost. Brez silikona.

ingredient-information.sestavine: Aqua, sodium laureth sulfate, cocamidopropyl betaine, sodium chloride, coco-glucoside, glycerin, panthenol, zinc sulfate, polyquaternium-10, menthol, citric acid, styrene/acrylates opolymer, parfum, sodium benzoate.
